com.yantra.interop.japi

Interface YIFDataSecurityValidator


  • public interface YIFDataSecurityValidator
    Implement this interface to provide custom data security validations. During execution, the setUserId and setProperties methods will be called first, followed by a call to isValid.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isValid(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inDoc)
      Validate that the user has permission to the document.
      void setProperties(java.util.Properties prop)
      Sets any custom properties.
      void setUserId(java.lang.String userId)
      Sets the user that is to be used for validation.

    • Method Detail

      • setUserId

        void setUserId(java.lang.String userId)
        Sets the user that is to be used for validation. userId UserId of the User.

      • setProperties

        void setProperties(java.util.Properties prop)
        Sets any custom properties. prop Custom Properties.

      • isValid

        boolean isValid(YFSEnvironment env,
                org.w3c.dom.Document inDoc)
        Validate that the user has permission to the document. env Environment inDoc XML document sent to the data security component. true if the user has permission to the document, false otherwise.
